summary: One Handed/Spellsword focused follower available in UNP, Custom CBBE, and SeveNBase; With and Without Armor; 2k and 4K options.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana]

[youtube]6oOkQW2QhV8[/youtube]

[/font][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Ruby[/size][/color][/b][font=Verdana]

Based on The World of RipX's Character on his [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs6RGhIXb1FfZOjntqs7jzg]YouTube channel[/url].
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/24998734/?]The World of RipX[/url].

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/hoo5ms03r/20170102203205_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6pclm15dz/Story.png[/img]
[i]Ruby always lived in Amethyst’s shadow. Ever the little sister, Ruby soon realized she would not best her sister in battle prowess, as her father chose to favor Amethyst and always took her with him on trips while leaving Ruby to stay with her mother. Her mother was sympathetic to Ruby’s pain and proceeded to teach her the ways of Shyeri magic, something that Amethyst was never really interested in learning (aside from healing magic, of course). Over the course of her teenage years, Ruby grew powerful in the ways of Shyeri fire magic, and eventually was able to create and manipulate powerful fire blasts. Ruby often took long solo journeys into the woods to perfect her magic. She soon started a fascination with the undead. It was a great way to strengthen her fire magic, and the weapons sold for just enough to keep food in her belly. Soon, undead weren’t enough for her so she moved up to the next target: vampires. She would research and find small dens, destroy them, and pillage their treasures. She quickly discovered that vampires had more worthwhile possessions. She grew to hate them, and they her.


Several months later, on one fateful journey home she stopped by a known vampire den for a quick battle. Sadly, this turned out to be a trap. The vampire clans knew her name well by now, and had planned an ambush. She fought valiantly but she was overwhelmed. The vampires did not seek to kill her, though…they thought of a punishment much more…ironic. They bit her and left her to suffer “the turn”, eventually to become that which she most hated.

She returned home and found her father and mother home, yet Amethyst had not yet returned. She came into the house crying for help. Ruby’s mother, strong in Shyeri magic, saw that uby looked different and her eyes were actually red now. She sensed the change in Ruby and immediately had Ruby sit down. The only chance to save Ruby was to infuse Ruby with enough Shyeri magic to drive out the vampirism. Unfortunately, during the ceremony, Ruby went mad during the massive infusion of shyeri magic and killed both her mother and her father. Luckily, her mother had done enough to stop the turn, but not enough to rid her of the effects completely. Although her thirst and fags were gone, her eyes were still red. She found that her ability to create fire made her immune to it, also discovered that in addition to fire blasts, she could now transform her life aura itself into a protective flame cloak. However, she still retained certain vampire abilities. She now had the power of invisibility, and could drain life. Her ability to charm men was also strengthened now by the power of vampire seduction.

Realizing what she had just done, she fled the town. On her way out, she watched as the town burned a couple at the stake for teaching their daughter the ways of battle, forbidden in the Shyeri clan. The daughter, Rolonce’, was made to watch as this happened. As Ruby left town she sensed a huge power surge and turned to see her village vaporized by lightning. Evidentially that daughter had her own secrets. Well, so much the better…no witnesses; her secret was safe. She sensed that the girl who caused all the destruction was still alive, but Ruby had bigger things on her plate. One day, if it benefited her, she would seek her out. One day…[/i]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/waotlvslj/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Ruby
Voice:  Female Commander
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  68
Body Options:  UNP, Custom CBBE, SeveNBase
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k options)
Armor:  [size=2]Sylvanas Queen of the Forsaken[/size]
Weapons:  Insanitys Celtic Katana (enchanted) & Sylvanas Retextured Bow/Arrows
[i][size=1]*Retextured Armor/Bow/Arrows by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4920410/?]ilikeawp[/url]*[/size][/i]
Location:  Markarth - Silver Blood Inn

Class:  Spellsword
Style:  One Handed Boss

Levels with player.  Breton/Redguard traits w/ Vampire Hunter Sight.
Skill bonuses/Perk Trees:  Light Armor, Archery, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration, One Handed, Sneak
Spells:  Healing Related, Fireball, Flame Cloak, Invisibility, Vampire Drain

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Who is this Amethyst you speak of?
A:  You can find Amethyst [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80542/?]here[/url]

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from The World of RipX

Q:  Where can I get the rest of the weapons pictured?
A:  Please see the Credits/Resources section for links

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.
